name: Canaan Online
storyline: Canaan Online is set in a heroic fantasy world. Its inhabitants have fled their former world through a magical gate known as the Sacred Gate, arriving in a new, paradisiacal world. After many years of human strife and conflict, the people seek to return to their former land, to start anew and rebuild their civilization.
summary: Canaan is a free-to-play browser Flash MMORPG set in a fantasy world with Manga-styled graphics. Players choose among 4 unique classes to explore and adventure with, accepting and completing quests, battling creatures, collecting pets, learning and increasing skills, engaging in PvP combat, and even getting married.
